    10.2.6

    Broker Played Time 

    Version: 10.2.6.0
    by: LudiusMaximus, Phanx

    DataBroker plugin to track played time across all your characters.

    It differs from similar addons in that it only tracks played time; it does not track other things like experience or money.

    The tooltip lists all of your characters across both factions on all servers. The current character is listed first for quick reference. Character names are colored by class. Faction icons, class icons, and character levels can also be shown if desired.

    Right-click the plugin for options.
    Language Support
    Works in all locales. Translated into English, Deutsch, EspaÒol, FranÁais, Italiano, PortuguÍs, Русский, 한국어, 简体中文, and 正體中文.

    To add or update translations for any locale, enter them on the Broker Played Time localization page on CurseForge, and then leave a comment, or send me a PM here or on CurseForge, to let me know that youíve made changes. If you donít have a Curse account and donít want to create one, you can PM me your translations instead. Thanks!
    Option examples

    ### 4.3.4.44 ###
    Compatible with both 4.3.4 live realms and Mists of Pandaria beta realms.
    - Added some space between icons in the tooltip.
    - Reduced the size of class icons in the tooltip slightly.
    - Removed the faction icon files from the addon folder, and use ones built into the game client instead.

    ### 4.3.4.43 ###
    Compatible with both 4.3.4 live realms and Mists of Pandaria beta realms.
    - Added Italian localization.

    ### 4.2.0.31 ###
    Updated for WoW 4.2

    ### 4.1.0.30 ###
    - Fixed a bug that prevented the first character on a server from being removed
    - Updated Russian translations from YOti @ CurseForge
    - Updated for WoW 4.1

    Ammako
    A Frostmaul Preserver

    Forum posts: 256
    File comments: 29
    Uploads: 8
    So I have some newly-created Lv. 1s that show 0m play time on the broker, even though they actually have several minutes of play time.

    Haven't gotten around to playing them just yet, so I'm not sure if that will resolve itself after a bit more time :s

    Also I have a suggestion, could an option be added to only display characters from the current realm? I have a lot of characters from many realms, so the list can get reaaaaaallyyyy long.

    Then at the bottom of the tooltip, you could have two lines like this:
    "Total played time on this realm:"
    "Total played time:"

    Because I'd still want to be able to see my total played time across all characters no matter what, but I really don't need to see the whole list of all characters on all realms at all times. Right now I'm lucky and my character list -just- reaches out to the bottom of the list but I'm afraid that any more will break something.

    Edit: Ended up getting more characters, and the tooltip overflows through the bottom of the screen lol.

    I've made personal edits to the add-on on my end to make it do exactly what I wanted, but it would be awesome if an option for it could be officially added into the add-on.
    Last edited by Ammako : 08-09-16 at 10:50 PM.

    ## Title-deDE: Broker: Zeit gespielt

    So you want all the realms/factions merged, and just one big list sorted by time? It probably makes more sense to split that up into two options:

    1. Sort by name | Sort by time
    2. Show in groups | Don't group

    I'm open to that, but have too many more important things to do at the moment... if you can submit a ticket that will greatly increase the chances that I'll remember this when all the patch-related fixing is done.
